title: Quiz & Mind Games Music Pack
description: 14 cerebral music themes, totaling 59 tracks with loops and stingers. Ideal for quiz and educational gaming experiences.
longDescription:
Dive into a world of introspective melodies and quirky rhythms within our music pack.


| YOUTUBE PREVIEW


| SOUNDCLOUD PREVIEW


Each track boasts chamber orchestral arrangements, weaving pizzicato strings and the patter of mallets into a tapestry of sound. Suspended atmospheres draw you into a pensive and meditative state, perfect for quiz, educational and mind games. But beyond these, imagine the music enhancing puzzle adventures or strategy games, where players require focus and a hint of tension to navigate challenges. Whether unraveling mysteries or plotting tactics, our music sets the tone for immersive gameplay, guiding players through the depths of their minds.


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/



INCLUDED WITH THIS PACK:


  • 14 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structure;
  • 59 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and stingers (intros or outros);
  • 42 minutes of original audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format
technicalDetails:
Features (main tracks and edits):

  1. Awkward Situations (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  2. Quirky Curious Background (1 main, 2 loops, 2 outros)
  3. Forward Thinking (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  4. Calculations (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  5. Mind Games (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  6. Waiting Room (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  7. Clever Solutions (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  8. Investigative Journalism (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  9. Puzzling Discoveries (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  10. Smart Ambient (1 main, 2 loops)
  11. Reflective Pattering Strings (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  12. Gossip Stories (1 main, 2 loops, 3 outros)
  13. Chamber Of Secrets (1 main, 2 loops, 2 outros)
  14. Ordinary Magic (1 main, 2 loops, 1 outro)


Number of Audio Wavs: 59

Number of Audio Cues: 59

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42:08 (

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com
